projects.name: Alteil Horizons - turn based tactics card game - Relaunch
projects.blurb: Turn-based tactics card game with a battle grid by creators of Star Ocean & Valkyrie Profile. Artists from Zelda & Final Fantasy

projects.name: Lords of Xulima - An Epic Story of Gods and Humans
projects.blurb: A 2D isometric, turn-based Role-Playing Game with the depth and challenge of old-school classics and a modern, intuitive interface.

projects.name: Dwarven Delve - An Action Dungeon Crawl with a Twist
projects.blurb: It's Diablo meets Pipe Mania! An Action Puzzle Crawl in which you change the dungeon layout on the fly using rotating tunnel sections.

projects.name: Elliot Quest
projects.blurb: Elliot Quest is inspired by Zelda II: The Adventure of Link.

projects.name: Ascendant, a 2.5D roguelike-brawler for the PC
projects.blurb: Bash your way through hordes of zealots, fanatics, and beasts in a bid to overthrow a tyrannical god in this 2.5D roguelike-brawler

projects.name: Paradise Lost: First Contact
projects.blurb: Play as an alien plant and escape from a scientific facility, full of secrets and dangerous experiments. PC/Mac/Linux/Wii U/Ouya

projects.name: STASIS - 2D Isometric SciFi Horror Adventure Game.
projects.blurb: STASIS -Classic point & click adventure game played from a unique isometric view point set in a science fiction universe in 2D.

projects.name: Bloom: Memories -- A new kind of action adventure RPG!
projects.blurb: Experience a world and story unlike any other! This is a passion project made with a deep love for games. For gamers, by gamers.

projects.name: Tadpole Treble
projects.blurb: A musical adventure with a focus on fun, challenging gameplay! A game from the creator of Brawl in the Family.

projects.name: DYSCOURSE: Survivors, Choose Wisely.
projects.blurb: A PC survival game like you’ve never seen. Emergent story, group psychology, and the struggle to endure, in the absurd Owlchemy style.

projects.name: Interstellaria
projects.blurb: Explore a vast sandbox galaxy! Experience the spirit of old school space games with modern mechanics. PC/MAC/LINUX/MOBILE

projects.name: Windforge
projects.blurb: CONTRA meets MINECRAFT in a building-block RPG! Explore an ever-changing steampunk world featuring Airships & Sky Whales!

projects.name: Wings: Remastered Edition
projects.blurb: Amiga classic Wings gets re-mastered in high definition with all its original missions, dogfights, story and gameplay!

projects.name: Lobodestroyo - Rareware inspired 3D Action Platformer Game
projects.blurb: A retro action adventure game inspired by N64-era collect-a-thon platformers. Channeling the spirit of Rareware's late 90's titles.

projects.name: Approaching Infinity: A Space Adventure Roguelike
projects.blurb: Retro space exploration game in the spirit of Starflight and Star Control, set in an infinite procedural universe. Combat,quests,loot!

projects.name: Catacomb Kids - A Very Roguelike Platformer
projects.blurb: A brutal platformer roguelike that pits you against the deadly Catacombs aided only by magic, steel, and your quick reflexes.

projects.name: Shadow Era: Shattered Fates - Cross Platform Card Game
projects.blurb: We need your help to take Shadow Era to the next level and release the third set of this highly rated, cross-platform TCG!

projects.name: Dex - Cyberpunk 2D RPG
projects.blurb: A story-driven action/stealth sidescrolling RPG with a fresh new vision of cyberspace.

projects.name: SMASH
projects.blurb: A fruit-smashing virtual reality game on Xbox One, PC, Mac and Linux. Designed for Sixense STEM / Oculus Rift / Xbox Kinect.

projects.name: Hand of Fate, a card game that comes to life
projects.blurb: Hand of Fate brings card gaming to video game life.  An infinitely replayable series of quests; build your deck, then try to defeat it!
